body:
You walk into the store, the essence you smell is delightful, as you dig through your pockets you find that you have $10 to spend, as you grab the menu you read.

-=+=-
Entree:
Plain Ramen Noodles (Would help you manage and save money) $2
Udon Noodles (Will allow you to never get full) $3
Wonton Noodle Soup (Will allow you to have loving respectful offspring) $3

Mains:
Chicken Ramen Noodles (Will allow you to fix most first world problems) $2
Beef Ramen Noodles (Will allow you to fix most third world problems) $7
Seafood Udon Noodles (Will allow you to find all food tasty) $4
Kung Pao Chicken with Noodles (Will allow your life to be more exciting) $5
Sweet and Sour Pork with Noodles (Will allow you to find the love of your life) $6
Chicken Fried Rice (Will allow you to earn a large fortune of money) $8

Sides:
Dumplings (Will give you amazing gaming skills) $2
Pork Buns (Will give you amazing smartness) $3
Fortune Cookie (Will tell you your future) $1
Miso Soup (Will make you look beautiful) $3
-=+=-

So just remember
you have $10. What do you buy?
